title: Modern Mangalsutra Necklace with Diamond Pendant
features: Delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black beads (nalla pusalu). Features a contemporary oval pendant set with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds in a pave setting.
occasions: Modern interpretations of traditional Telugu wedding ceremonies like Pendli or Mangalasutram Dharana.
description: A modern take on a traditional symbol of marriage. The delicate design and sparkling diamonds make it a perfect everyday piece. Crafted with high-quality 18k rose gold for lasting shine and durability. Offers a subtle blend of Indian heritage and contemporary aesthetics.
